variables.name: HOP_AGGREGATION_ALL_NULLS_ARE_ZERO
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' to return 0 when all values within an aggregate are NULL. Otherwise by default a NULL is returned when all values are NULL.

variables.name: HOP_AGGREGATION_MIN_NULL_IS_VALUED
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' to set the minimum to NULL if NULL is within an aggregate. Otherwise by default NULL is ignored by the MIN aggregate and MIN is set to the minimum value that is not NULL. See also the variable HOP_AGGREGATION_ALL_NULLS_ARE_ZERO.

variables.name: HOP_ALLOW_EMPTY_FIELD_NAMES_AND_TYPES
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' to allow your pipeline to pass 'null' fields and/or empty types.

variables.name: HOP_AUTO_CREATE_CONFIG
variables.description: Set this value to N if you don't want to automatically create a hop configuration file (hop-config.json) when it's missing

variables.name: HOP_BATCHING_ROWSET
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' if you want to test a more efficient batching row set.

variables.name: HOP_COMPATIBILITY_DB_IGNORE_TIMEZONE
variables.description: System wide flag to ignore timezone while writing date/timestamp value to the database.

variables.name: HOP_COMPATIBILITY_MERGE_ROWS_USE_REFERENCE_STREAM_WHEN_IDENTICAL
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' for backward compatibility for the Merge Rows (diff) transform. Setting this to Y will use the data from the reference stream (instead of the comparison stream) in case the compared rows are identical.

variables.name: HOP_COMPATIBILITY_TEXT_FILE_OUTPUT_APPEND_NO_HEADER
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' for backward compatibility for the Text File Output transform. Setting this to Ywill add no header row at all when the append option is enabled, regardless if the file is existing or not.

variables.name: HOP_CORE_TRANSFORMS_FILE
variables.description:
The name of the project variable that will contain the alternative location of the hop-transforms.xml file. You can use this to
      customize the list of available internal transforms outside of the codebase.

variables.name: HOP_CORE_WORKFLOW_ACTIONS_FILE
variables.description: The name of the project variable that will contain the alternative location of the hop-workflow-actions.xml file.

variables.name: HOP_DEFAULT_BIGNUMBER_FORMAT
variables.description: The name of the variable containing an alternative default bignumber format

variables.name: HOP_DEFAULT_BUFFER_POLLING_WAITTIME
variables.description: This is the default polling frequency for the transforms input buffer (in ms)

variables.name: HOP_DEFAULT_DATE_FORMAT
variables.description: The name of the variable containing an alternative default date format

variables.name: HOP_DEFAULT_INTEGER_FORMAT
variables.description: The name of the variable containing an alternative default integer format

variables.name: HOP_DEFAULT_NUMBER_FORMAT
variables.description: The name of the variable containing an alternative default number format

variables.name: HOP_DEFAULT_SERVLET_ENCODING
variables.description: Defines the default encoding for servlets, leave it empty to use Java default encoding

variables.name: HOP_DEFAULT_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT
variables.description: The name of the variable containing an alternative default timestamp format

variables.name: HOP_DISABLE_CONSOLE_LOGGING
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' to disable standard Hop logging to the console. (stdout)

variables.name: HOP_EMPTY_STRING_DIFFERS_FROM_NULL
variables.description: NULL vs Empty String. If this setting is set to 'Y', an empty string and null are different. Otherwise they are not

variables.name: HOP_FAIL_ON_LOGGING_ERROR
variables.description:
Set this variable to Y when you want the workflow/pipeline fail with an error when the related logging process (e.g. to a database)
      fails.

variables.name: HOP_FILE_OUTPUT_MAX_STREAM_COUNT
variables.description: This project variable is used by the Text File Output transform. It defines the max number of simultaneously open files within the transform. The transform will close/reopen files as necessary to insure the max is not exceeded

variables.name: HOP_FILE_OUTPUT_MAX_STREAM_LIFE
variables.description: This project variable is used by the Text File Output transform. It defines the max number of milliseconds between flushes of files opened by the transform.

variables.name: HOP_GLOBAL_LOG_VARIABLES_CLEAR_ON_EXPORT
variables.description: Set this variable to 'N' to preserve global log variables defined in pipeline / workflow Properties -> Log panel. Changing it to 'Y' will clear it when export pipeline / workflow.

variables.name: HOP_JSON_INPUT_INCLUDE_NULLS
variables.description: Name of the variable to set so that Nulls are considered while parsing JSON files. If HOP_JSON_INPUT_INCLUDE_NULLS is "Y" then nulls will be included (default behavior) otherwise they will not be included

variables.name: HOP_LENIENT_STRING_TO_NUMBER_CONVERSION
variables.description: System wide flag to allow lenient string to number conversion for backward compatibility. If this setting is set to 'Y', an string starting with digits will be converted successfully into a number. (example: 192.168.1.1 will be converted into 192 or 192.168 or 192168 depending on the decimal and grouping symbol). The default (N) will be to throw an error if non-numeric symbols are found in the string.

variables.name: HOP_LICENSE_HEADER_FILE
variables.description: This is the name of the variable which when set should contains the path to a file which will be included in the serialization of pipelines and workflows

variables.name: HOP_LOG_MARK_MAPPINGS
variables.description: Set this variable to 'Y' to precede transform/action name in log lines with the complete path to the transform/action. Useful to perfectly identify where a problem happened in our process.

variables.name: HOP_LOG_SIZE_LIMIT
variables.description: The log size limit for all pipelines and workflows that don't have the "log size limit" property set in their respective properties.

variables.name: HOP_LOG_TAB_REFRESH_DELAY
variables.description: The hop log tab refresh delay.

variables.name: HOP_LOG_TAB_REFRESH_PERIOD
variables.description: The hop log tab refresh period.

variables.name: HOP_MAX_ACTIONS_LOGGED
variables.description: The maximum number of action results kept in memory for logging purposes.

variables.name: HOP_MAX_LOGGING_REGISTRY_SIZE
variables.description: The maximum number of logging registry entries kept in memory for logging purposes

variables.name: HOP_MAX_LOG_SIZE_IN_LINES
variables.description: The maximum number of log lines that are kept internally by Hop. Set to 0 to keep all rows (default)

variables.name: HOP_MAX_LOG_TIMEOUT_IN_MINUTES
variables.description: The maximum age (in minutes) of a log line while being kept internally by Hop. Set to 0 to keep all rows indefinitely (default)

variables.name: HOP_MAX_TAB_LENGTH
variables.description: A variable to configure Tab size

variables.name: HOP_MAX_WORKFLOW_TRACKER_SIZE
variables.description: The maximum age (in minutes) of a log line while being kept internally by Hop. Set to 0 to keep all rows indefinitely (default)

variables.name: HOP_PASSWORD_ENCODER_PLUGIN
variables.description: Specifies the password encoder plugin to use by ID (Hop is the default).

variables.name: HOP_PIPELINE_PAN_JVM_EXIT_CODE
variables.description: Set this variable to an integer that will be returned as the Pan JVM exit code.

variables.name: HOP_PIPELINE_ROWSET_SIZE
variables.description: Name of the environment variable that contains the size of the pipeline rowset size. This overwrites values that you set pipeline settings

variables.name: HOP_PLUGIN_CLASSES
variables.description: A comma delimited list of classes to scan for plugin annotations

variables.name: HOP_PLUGIN_PACKAGES
variables.description: A comma delimited list of packages to scan for plugin annotations (warning: slow!!)

variables.name: HOP_REDIRECT_STDERR
variables.description: Set this variable to Y to redirect stderr to Hop logging.

variables.name: HOP_REDIRECT_STDOUT
variables.description: Set this variable to Y to redirect stdout to Hop logging.

variables.name: HOP_ROWSET_GET_TIMEOUT
variables.description: The name of the variable that optionally contains an alternative rowset get timeout (in ms). This only makes a difference for extremely short lived pipelines.

variables.name: HOP_ROWSET_PUT_TIMEOUT
variables.description: The name of the variable that optionally contains an alternative rowset put timeout (in ms). This only makes a difference for extremely short lived pipelines.

variables.name: HOP_SERVER_DETECTION_TIMER
variables.description: The name of the variable that defines the timer used for detecting server nodes

variables.name: HOP_SERVER_JETTY_ACCEPTORS
variables.description: A variable to configure jetty option: acceptors for Hop server

variables.name: HOP_SERVER_JETTY_ACCEPT_QUEUE_SIZE
variables.description: A variable to configure jetty option: acceptQueueSize for Hop server

variables.name: HOP_SERVER_JETTY_RES_MAX_IDLE_TIME
variables.description: A variable to configure jetty option: lowResourcesMaxIdleTime for Hop server

variables.name: HOP_SERVER_OBJECT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES
variables.description: This project variable will set a time-out after which waiting, completed or stopped pipelines and workflows will be automatically cleaned up. The default value is 1440 (one day).

variables.name: HOP_SERVER_REFRESH_STATUS
variables.description: A variable to configure refresh for Hop server workflow/pipeline status page

variables.name: HOP_SPLIT_FIELDS_REMOVE_ENCLOSURE
variables.description: Set this variable to 'N' to preserve enclosure symbol after splitting the string in the Split fields transform. Changing it to true will remove first and last enclosure symbol from the resulting string chunks.

variables.name: HOP_SYSTEM_HOSTNAME
variables.description: You can use this variable to speed up hostname lookup. Hostname lookup is performed by Hop so that it is capable of logging the server on which a workflow or pipeline is executed.

variables.name: HOP_TRANSFORM_PERFORMANCE_SNAPSHOT_LIMIT
variables.description: The maximum number of transform performance snapshots to keep in memory. Set to 0 to keep all snapshots indefinitely (default)

variables.name: HOP_USE_NATIVE_FILE_DIALOG
variables.description: Set this value to 'Y' if you want to use the system file open/save dialog when browsing files.

variables.name: HOP_ZIP_MAX_ENTRY_SIZE
variables.description: A variable to configure the maximum file size of a single zip entry

variables.name: HOP_ZIP_MAX_TEXT_SIZE
variables.description: A variable to configure the maximum number of characters of text that are extracted before an exception is thrown during extracting text from documents

variables.name: HOP_ZIP_MIN_INFLATE_RATIO
variables.description: A variable to configure the minimum allowed ratio between de- and inflated bytes to detect a zipbomb

variables.name: NEO4J_LOGGING_CONNECTION
variables.description: Set this variable to the name of an existing Neo4j connection to enable execution logging to a Neo4j database.

variables.name: HOP_CONTEXT_DIALOG_STRICT_SEARCH
variables.description: This variable influences how the search is done in the context dialog, when set to Y it will do a strict search (Needed for automated UI testing)
